sub-events.comment: At the beginning of the game delete the line and assign different pictures give their type
Create START ELEMENTS สร้างจำนวน
If this is the first touch, then memorize the position and type of item
Create an active line, which will look for other elements. When will then stick to them
It moves the line in different directions depending on pointer
If no suitable cell is found, then stick to it. Make a last line inactive and create a new
Do all the same steps that were made and the first selected item
If the chain was more than 2 elements, then destroy them
If less, then destroy only the line and reset the local variables of pictures
After the destruction of elements to create in their place new ones.
If the item destroyed >6, then give 50 points for each and add time for each
